challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Če bi ti slišal, potem bi bili tihi.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.answer: Če bi ti slišal, potem bi bili tihi.
challenges.meaning: If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.formattedSolution: Če bi ti slišal, potem bi bili tihi.
If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Če ti ne bi bil neumen, potem ne bi delal neumnosti.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.answer: Če ti ne bi bil neumen, potem ne bi delal neumnosti.
challenges.meaning: If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.formattedSolution: Če ti ne bi bil neumen, potem ne bi delal neumnosti.
If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Če oni ne bi bili leni, potem bi jim pomagali.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If they were not lazy, we would help them.

challenges.formattedSolution: Če oni ne bi bili leni, potem bi jim pomagali.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Otroci so modri za svojo starost.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: Children are wiser for their age.

challenges.answer: Otroci so modri za svojo starost.

challenges.formattedSolution: Otroci so modri za svojo starost.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Če vi ne bi bili šibki, potem bi delali.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you were not weak, you would work.

challenges.answer: Če vi ne bi bili šibki, potem bi delali.
challenges.meaning: If you were not weak, you would work.

challenges.formattedSolution: Če vi ne bi bili šibki, potem bi delali.

challenges.meaning: A sincere person says what they think.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: A wise person stays silent when needed.

challenges.meaning: A wise person stays silent when needed.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Če bi bil jaz drzen, potem se ne bi bal.
